name: Flightera Flight Data
description: Flight status, on-time performance and statistics by Flightera

api_methods.name: flightSearch
api_methods.description:
Returns a list of flights for a given flight number. Minimum and/or maximum date can optionally be specified to limit the search. Results are ordered by departure date ascending. The next departure time is returned for pagination.
Will return a 400 if the date range requested is outside the subscription level

parameters.name: flnr
parameters.description: The flight number to request

parameters.name: dtFrom
parameters.description: The minimum date to request

parameters.name: dtTo
parameters.description: The maximum date to request

utterances.utterance: What is the status of flight number 123?
Can you provide details for flight 456 departing after 2023-10-01?
Find information on flight 789 departing between 2023-11-01 and 2023-11-15.
Get the next departure time for flight 101.
What are the details for flight 202 departing before 2023-12-31?
Search for flight 303 departing after 2023-09-01 and before 2023-09-30.
Provide the status of flight 404.
Find flight 505 departing on or after 2023-08-15.
Get details for flight 606 departing between 2023-07-01 and 2023-07-10.
What is the next departure time for flight 707?

api_methods.name: airlineSearch
api_methods.description:
Returns a list of airlines for a given country, identifiers or name search pattern. Multiple arguments can be specified to limit the search.
Either one of the arguments must be specified.

parameters.name: iata
parameters.description: The IATA code of the airline

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name or part of the name of the airline, case insensitive

parameters.name: icao
parameters.description: The ICAO code of the airline

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code country code to request

utterances.utterance: Find airlines based in the United States.
Search for airlines with the IATA code 'AA'.
Look up airlines with the ICAO code 'AAL'.
Find airlines that include 'Delta' in their name.
Search for airlines based in Canada.
Find airlines with the IATA code 'BA'.
Look up airlines with the ICAO code 'BAW'.
Search for airlines that include 'Air' in their name.
Find airlines based in Germany.
Search for airlines with the IATA code 'LH'.

api_methods.name: aircraftSearch
api_methods.description:
A list of plane registrations for a given search criteria.
Can search by airline ident, country, model
If multiple arguments are provided, they will be chained as AND
Returns only currently active aircraft

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: Model ICAO code

parameters.name: airline_ident
parameters.description: The ident of the airline, as returned by /airline/search

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Two letter country code

utterances.utterance: Find all active aircraft models for the airline Delta.
Search for active aircraft in the United States.
List all active Boeing 737 aircraft.
Find active Airbus A320 aircraft operated by American Airlines.
Search for active aircraft in Canada operated by Air Canada.
List all active Embraer E190 aircraft in Brazil.
Find active aircraft models operated by British Airways.
Search for active Airbus A380 aircraft in Germany.
List all active aircraft in Australia.
Find active Boeing 777 aircraft operated by Emirates.

api_methods.name: airportSearch
api_methods.description:
Returns a list of airports for a given country, bbox or timezone. Multiple arguments can be specified to limit the search.
Either one of country, bbox or timezone must be specified.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The timezone of the airport (e.g. Europe/Berlin)

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code country code to request

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: A bbox (min Longitude , min Latitude , max Longitude , max Latitude), will restrict results to airports within that box

utterances.utterance: Find airports in Germany.
Search for airports in the Europe/Berlin timezone.
List airports within the bounding box 10, 50, 15, 55.
Get airports located in France.
Find airports in the America/New_York timezone.
Search for airports within the bounding box -80, 25, -70, 30.
List airports in Japan.
Find airports in the Asia/Tokyo timezone.
Get airports within the bounding box -10, 35, 0, 40.
Search for airports in Canada.

api_methods.name: airportInfo
api_methods.description:
Returns detailed airport information for airports identified by the provided identifiers. In most cases the list should contain only one entry.
However, due to the nature of the data, it is possible that multiple entries are returned.
If searched by ident, only one airport is returned.
One of ident, iata, icao, localID must be provided.

parameters.name: icao
parameters.description: The ICAO code of the airport, must have a length of 4

parameters.name: localID
parameters.description: Local identifiers of the airport, currently mostly available for the US & CA (FAA-ID). Max length is 6

parameters.name: iata
parameters.description: The IATA code of the airport, must have a length of 3

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: The ident of the airport, as returned by /airport/search

utterances.utterance: Can you provide information about the airport with the ICAO code KLAX?
What are the details for the airport identified by the IATA code JFK?
I need information about the airport with the local ID LAX.
Could you fetch details for the airport with the ident KJFK?
Please provide airport information for the ICAO code EGLL.
What is the airport information for the IATA code LHR?
Can you get me the details for the airport with the local ID YYZ?
I need the airport information for the ident EGLL.
What are the details for the airport with the ICAO code OMDB?
Could you provide information about the airport with the IATA code DXB?

api_methods.name: airlineAircrafts
api_methods.description:
A list of plane registrations for a given airline. Can search by ident only.
Only returns currently active aircraft

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: The ident of the airline, as returned by /airline/search

utterances.utterance: Can you provide a list of active aircraft for Delta Airlines?
What are the currently active planes for American Airlines?
Show me the active aircraft registrations for United Airlines.
List all active planes for Southwest Airlines.
What aircraft are currently active for British Airways?
Can you get me the list of active planes for Lufthansa?
Show the active aircraft for Air France.
What are the active plane registrations for Emirates?
List all currently active aircraft for Qatar Airways.
Can you provide the active planes for Singapore Airlines?

api_methods.name: flightStatistics
api_methods.description:
Returns statistics for a flight number with one entry per route flown. Statistics are updated daily.
The query can be filtered by route.
Statistics are always as of today, please contact us if you require historical statistics.

parameters.name: flnr
parameters.description: The flight number to request

parameters.name: aptFrom
parameters.description: Departure airport ident

parameters.name: aptTo
parameters.description: Arrival airport ident

utterances.utterance: What are the statistics for flight number 123?
Can you provide the flight statistics for flight 456 departing from JFK?
I need the statistics for flight 789 arriving at LAX.
Get the flight statistics for flight 101 departing from ORD and arriving at SFO.
What are the on-time performance stats for flight 202?
Provide the statistics for flight 303 departing from DFW.
I need the flight statistics for flight 404 arriving at ATL.
Can you give me the statistics for flight 505 departing from SEA and arriving at DEN?
What are the flight statistics for flight 606?
Get the statistics for flight 707 departing from BOS and arriving at MIA.

api_methods.name: airlineStatistics
api_methods.description:
Returns detailed airline statistics for airlines identified by the provided identifiers. In most cases the list should contain only one entry, unless the ident is ambiguous.
If searched by ident, only one airline is returned.
One of ident, iata, icao must be provided.
Statistics are calculated overnight and represent the current day's data.

parameters.name: icao
parameters.description: The ICAO code of the airline, must have a length of 4

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: The ident of the airline, as returned by /airline/search

parameters.name: iata
parameters.description: The IATA code of the airline, must have a length of 3

utterances.utterance: What are the statistics for the airline with the ICAO code AAL?
Can you provide the airline statistics for the ident DELTA?
I need the flight statistics for the airline with the IATA code BA.
Get me the airline statistics for the ICAO code UAL.
What are the current statistics for the airline identified by the code SWA?
Can you fetch the airline statistics for the IATA code AF?
Provide the airline statistics for the ICAO code DAL.
I need the statistics for the airline with the ident AMERICAN.
What are the airline statistics for the IATA code LH?
Get the statistics for the airline with the ICAO code QFA.

api_methods.name: flightInfo
api_methods.description: Returns the info for a flight on a specified date, or the current flight if date is omitted. Will return a 400 if the date requested is outside the subscription level

parameters.name: flnr
parameters.description: The flight number to request

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date, if omitted the current flight will be returned

Get the flight statistics for flight 505 on 2023-09-10.
What is the status of flight 606 today?
Can you provide the flight details for flight 707 on 2023-08-20?

api_methods.name: airportMetar
api_methods.description:
Returns the most recent METAR for an airport specified by the given ident.
Includes a parsed version of the METAR.

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: The ident of the airport (e.g. as returned by /airport/search)

utterances.utterance: What is the latest METAR for JFK airport?
Can you provide the most recent METAR for Heathrow Airport?
Get the current METAR for Los Angeles International Airport.
What is the latest weather report for O'Hare International Airport?

What is the current METAR for Dubai International Airport?

What is the latest METAR for Frankfurt Airport?
Retrieve the current METAR for Singapore Changi Airport.

api_methods.name: airportDelayDailyStatistics
api_methods.description:
Returns detailed daily delay statistics for an airport identified by the provided identifiers. If searched by ident, only one airport is returned.
One of ident, iata, icao, localID must be provided. Additionally, `dt` and `isDeparture` are required.
Statistics are calculated overnight and represent the data for the specific date.

parameters.name: isDeparture
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the desired statistics are for departures (true) or arrivals (false)

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: The date for which delay statistics are desired, formatted as "YYYY-MM-DD"

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: The ident of the airport, as returned by /airport/search

utterances.utterance: What were the departure delay statistics for JFK airport on 2023-10-15?
Can you provide the arrival delay data for LAX on 2023-09-22?
Show me the departure delay statistics for Chicago O'Hare on 2023-08-10.
What were the arrival delays at Heathrow Airport on 2023-07-05?
Get the departure delay statistics for Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport on 2023-06-18.
What were the arrival delay statistics for San Francisco International Airport on 2023-05-12?
Show me the departure delay data for Atlanta Hartsfield-Jackson on 2023-04-25.
What were the arrival delays at Denver International Airport on 2023-03-14?
Get the departure delay statistics for Seattle-Tacoma International Airport on 2023-02-08.
What were the arrival delay statistics for Boston Logan International Airport on 2023-01-30?

api_methods.name: airportFlights
api_methods.description:
Returns a list of flights for an airport, direction and time. The list is sorted ascending by scheduled departure time for direction=="departure" and sorted descending by scheduled arrival time for direction=="arrival".
The next departure/arrival time is returned for pagination.
The dates returned for each flight represent the scheduled departure date in local time and can be used to query flight data via /flight/info.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Direction, one of "arrival", "departure"

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: Ident of the airport to request. Ident is the unique identifier as returned by /airport/search or /airport/info endpoints.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: Timestamp in UTC. If direction is "arrival", show flights with scheduled arrival time prior to this timestamp. If direction is "departure", show flights with scheduled departure time after this timestamp. Expected in any valid format, such as 2022-01-01T12:00:00.000Z. Maximum range of flights returned is 30 days.

parameters.name: counterpart_ident
parameters.description: Ident of the counterpart airport (destination if direction=arrival, otherwise arrival). Used to query connections on a defined route. Ident is the unique identifier as returned by /airport/search or /airport/info endpoints.

utterances.utterance: Show me the departures from JFK airport after 2023-10-15T10:00:00.000Z.
What are the arrivals at LAX airport before 2023-11-01T18:00:00.000Z?
List the departures from Heathrow airport after 2023-09-20T08:00:00.000Z.
Get the arrivals at O'Hare airport before 2023-12-05T22:00:00.000Z.
Show me the departures from Dubai International Airport after 2023-10-10T14:00:00.000Z.
What are the arrivals at Charles de Gaulle Airport before 2023-11-15T20:00:00.000Z?
List the departures from Sydney Airport after 2023-09-25T09:00:00.000Z.
Get the arrivals at Tokyo Haneda Airport before 2023-12-10T23:00:00.000Z.
Show me the departures from Frankfurt Airport after 2023-10-30T11:00:00.000Z.
What are the arrivals at Singapore Changi Airport before 2023-11-25T19:00:00.000Z?

Returns detailed aircraft information for an aircraft identified by registration.
Only works for currently active aircraft

parameters.name: reg
parameters.description: The registration of the aircraft, as returned by /airline/aircraft or /aircraft/search

api_methods.name: airlineFlights
api_methods.description:
Returns a list of flights for an airline given a start time. The list is sorted ascending by scheduled departure time.
The next departure/ time is returned for pagination (use start times to paginate).
The dates returned for each flight represent the scheduled departure date in local time and can be used to query flight data via /flight/info.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: Timestamp in UTC. Shows flights with scheduled departure time after this timestamp. Expected in any valid format, such as 2022-01-01T12:00:00.000Z. Maximum range of flights returned is 30 days.

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: Ident of the airline to request. Ident is the unique identifier as returned by /airline/search or /airline/info endpoints.

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the flights for American Airlines after 2023-10-01T08:00:00.000Z?

api_methods.name: airlineInfo
api_methods.description:
Returns detailed airline information for airlines identified by the provided identifiers. In most cases the list should contain only one entry.
However, due to the nature of the data, it is possible that multiple entries are returned.
If searched by ident, only one airline is returned.
One of ident, iata, icao, name must be provided.

parameters.name: icao
parameters.description: The ICAO code of the airline, must have a length of 4

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the airline. Not case sensitive

parameters.name: iata
parameters.description: The IATA code of the airline, must have a length of 3

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: The ident of the airline, as returned by /airline/search

utterances.utterance: Can you provide information about the airline with the ICAO code 'AAL'?

I need the airline information for the IATA code 'LH'.

api_methods.name: airportStatistics
api_methods.description:
Returns detailed airport statistics for airports identified by the provided identifiers. In most cases the list should contain only one entry, unless the ident is ambiguous.
If searched by ident, only one airport is returned.
One of ident, iata, icao, localID must be provided.
Statistics are calculated overnight and represent the current day's data.

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: The ident of the airport, as returned by /airport/search

parameters.name: localID
parameters.description: Local identifiers of the airport, currently mostly available for the US & CA (FAA-ID). Max length is 6

parameters.name: iata
parameters.description: The IATA code of the airport, must have a length of 3

parameters.name: icao
parameters.description: The ICAO code of the airport, must have a length of 4
